channel.title: Sherman Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sherman Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-97 North at US-197 - Wasco County
item.description: US-97 North at US-197 in Wasco County. Use US-197 north for Maupin and The Dalles; US-97 North for Wasco and Biggs.

item.title: End US-197 South Approaching US-97
item.description: End US-197 South approaching US-97. Use US-97 south for Madras and Bend; US-97 north for Biggs and Wasco.

item.title: US-197 South Approaching US-197
item.description: US-197 South approaching US-197. Use US-97 north for Wasco and Biggs; US-97 south for Madras and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South at I-84/US-30 East (Exit 104)
item.description: US-97 south at I-84/US-30 East (Exit 104) junction. Turn left on I-84/US-30 east for Rufus and Pendleton. Continue south on US-97 for Wasco and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 West (Exit 104). Turn right for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles and Portland. The Columbia River and the hills of Washington state are in the background of this photograph.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-293
item.description: US-97 south at OR-293. Use OR-293 east to Antelope, John Day Fossil Beds, and Fossil.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-293
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-293 in Jefferson County.

item.title: US-97 South at US-197
item.description: US-97 south at US-197. Use US-97 south for Madras and Bend. The northbound destination sign for US-197 was knocked over and lying on the ground.

item.title: US-97 South at US-197
item.description: US-97 south at US-197 junction. Taken at Shaniko Junction.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-218
item.description: US-97 south at OR-218 to Antelope and Fossil. Continue south on US-97 for Maupin, Madras, and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-218
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-218 in Shaniko.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Shaniko and Bend.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-216
item.description: US-97 south at OR-216. Use OR-216 west for Sherars Bridge, Tygh Valley, and Deschutes River Recreation Area.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-216
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-216 west - Sherars Bridge Highway.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-206 Interchange
item.description: US-97 South at OR-206 Interchange to Wasco and Condon.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-206 IC
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-206 interchange to Wasco and Condon.

item.title: US-97 South - Entering Oregon
item.description: Entering Oregon on US-97 south, crossing the Columbia River.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 West (Exit 104). Turn left for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. Continue north on US-97 towards Yakima (Washington). US-97 crosses over the Columbia River into Washington immediately north of this junction. The Columbia River and the hills of Washington state are in the background of this photograph.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84/US-30 (Exit 104)
item.description: US-97 north at I-84/US-30 (Exit 104) junction. Turn right on I-84/US-30 east for Rufus and Pendleton. Continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 west to The Dalles. The Columbia River, and bridge over the Columbia River into Washington is in the background of the photograph.

item.title: US-97 North at I-84 Frontage Road
item.description: I-84 north at I-84 Frontage Road, and approaching I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left on the Frontage Road for Deschutes State Park. Continue north on US-97 for I-84 junction, and Yakima (Washington). The Columbia River and Washington state are in the background of the photograph.

item.title: OR-206 West at US-97
item.description: OR-206 west at US-97 onramp. Turn right for US-97 north to Biggs Junction and The Dalles. Continue over the highway for US-97 southbound ramp to Bend.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 104
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 104 - US-97/Yakima/Bend. US-97 is the major north/south highway through Central Oregon, connecting Klamath Falls with Bend. US-97 crosses the Columbia River into Washington just north of here.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 104 Offramp at US-97
item.description: I-84 west Exit 104 offramp at US-97. Use US-97 north for Yakima. Use US-97 south for Deschutes Park/Wasco/Bend.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 104
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 104 - US-97/Yakima/Bend

item.title: I-84 West Exit 104
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 104, US-97/Yakima/Bend, 1 mile.
